22 ServoMotorPololuBase::ServoMotorPololuBase(unsigned short servoID,
23  unsigned short neutralPos,
24  unsigned short delta,
25  IPololu *pololuController){
26 
27  if(servoID < 0){
28  string msg("ServoMotorPololuBase::servo number is negative.");
29  throw new ExceptionServoMotorBase(msg);
30  }
31  servoNmb_ = servoID;
32 
33  if(neutralPos < 0){
34  string msg("ServoMotorPololuBase:: neutral position is negative.");
35  throw new ExceptionServoMotorBase(msg);
36  }
37  neutralPosition_ = neutralPos;
38 
39  if(neutralPosition_ <= delta){
40  string msg("ServoMotorPololuBase:: delta range is larger than neutral position.");
41  throw new ExceptionServoMotorBase(msg);
42  }
43  delta_ = delta;
44 
45  if(pololuController == NULL){
46  string msg("ServoMotorPololuBase:: controller reference is NULL pointer.");
47  throw new ExceptionServoMotorBase(msg);
48  }
49  pololuCtrl_ = pololuController;
50 
51  try{
52  pololuCtrl_->getPosition(servoNmb_);
53  }catch(IException *e){
54  stringstream ss;
55  ss << "ServoMotorPololuBase::constructor: no acces to servo motor ";
56  ss << "having ID " << servoNmb_ << ". Check servo motor ID parameter:";
57  ss << e->getMsg();
58  throw new ExceptionServoMotorBase(ss.str() );
59  }catch(string errMsg){
60  stringstream ss;
61  ss << "ServoMotorPololuBase::constructor: no acces to servo motor ";
62  ss << "having ID " << servoNmb_ << ". Check servo motor ID parameter:";
63  ss << errMsg;
64  throw new ExceptionServoMotorBase(ss.str());
65  }catch(...){
66  stringstream ss;
67  ss << "ServoMotorPololuBase::constructor: no acces to servo motor ";
68  ss << "having ID " << servoNmb_ << ". Check servo motor ID parameter:";
69  ss << "(unknown error).";
70  throw new ExceptionServoMotorBase(ss.str());
71  }
72  return;
73 }

77 ServoMotorPololuBase::~ServoMotorPololuBase(){
78  pololuCtrl_ = NULL;
79  return;
80 };

82 unsigned short ServoMotorPololuBase::getServoNumber(){return servoNmb_;};
83 
84 unsigned short ServoMotorPololuBase::getMinPosInAbs(){return (neutralPosition_ - delta_);};
85 
86 unsigned short ServoMotorPololuBase::getMidPosInAbs(){return neutralPosition_;};
87 
88 unsigned short ServoMotorPololuBase::getMaxPosInAbs(){return (neutralPosition_ + delta_);};
89 
90 unsigned short ServoMotorPololuBase::setPositionInAbs(unsigned short newPosition){
91  if((newPosition < this->getMinPosInAbs()) ||
92  (newPosition > this->getMaxPosInAbs())){
93  string msg("setPositionInDeg:: position value is out of range.");
94  throw new ExceptionServoMotorBase(msg);
95  }
96 
97 
98  try{
99  pololuCtrl_->setPosition(servoNmb_,newPosition);
100  }catch(IException *e){
101  string msg("setPositionInAbs:: error while trying to set a new position:");
102  msg += e->getMsg();
103  throw new ExceptionServoMotorBase(msg);
104  }catch(...){
105  string msg("setPositionInAbs:: error while trying to set a new position.");
106  throw new ExceptionServoMotorBase(msg);
107  }
108 
109  try{
110  return (pololuCtrl_->getPosition(servoNmb_));
111  }catch(IException *e){
112  string msg("setPositionInAbs:: error while trying to set a new position:");
113  msg += e->getMsg();
114  throw new ExceptionServoMotorBase(msg);
115  }catch(...){
116  string msg("setPositionInAbs:: error while trying to set a new position.");
117  throw new ExceptionServoMotorBase(msg);
118  }
119 
120 };
121

123  try{
124  return (pololuCtrl_->getPosition(servoNmb_));
125  }catch(IException *e){
126  string msg("setPositionInAbs:: error while trying to set a new position:");
127  msg += e->getMsg();
128  throw new ExceptionServoMotorBase(msg);
129  }catch(...){
130  string msg("setPositionInAbs:: error while trying to set a new position.");
131  throw new ExceptionServoMotorBase(msg);
132  }

159 unsigned short ServoMotorPololuBaseAdv::setSpeed(unsigned short newSpeed){
160  if(newSpeed > 255){
161  newSpeed = 255;
162  }
163  try{
164  pololuCtrl_->setSpeed(servoNmb_, newSpeed);
165  return newSpeed;
166  }catch(IException *e){
167  string msg("setPositionInAbs:: error while trying to set a new speed value:");
168  msg += e->getMsg();
169  throw new ExceptionServoMotorBaseAdv(msg);
170  }catch(...){
171  string msg("setPositionInAbs:: unknown error while trying to set a new speed value.");
172  throw new ExceptionServoMotorBaseAdv(msg);
173  }
174 }

186 unsigned short ServoMotorPololuBaseAdv::setAcceleration(unsigned short newAcceleration){
187  if(newAcceleration > 255){
188  newAcceleration = 255;
189  }
190  try{
191  pololuCtrl_->setSpeed(servoNmb_, newAcceleration);
192  return newAcceleration;
193  }catch(IException *e){
194  string msg("setPositionInAbs:: error while trying to set a new acceleration value:");
195  msg += e->getMsg();
196  throw new ExceptionServoMotorBaseAdv(msg);
197  }catch(...){
198  string msg("setPositionInAbs:: unknown error while trying to set a new acceleration value.");
199  throw new ExceptionServoMotorBaseAdv(msg);
200  }
201 }

215 void ServoMotor::setMinMaxDegree(short minDegree, short maxDegree){
216  if(maxDegree <= minDegree){
217  string msg("setMinMaxDegree:: min degree is larger or equal than max degree.");
218  throw new ExceptionServoMotor(msg);
219  }
220  minDeg_ = minDegree;
221  maxDeg_ = maxDegree;
222  return;
223 }
224 
225 void ServoMotor::setMinMaxRadian(float minRadian, float maxRadian){
226  if(maxRadian <= minRadian){
227  string msg("setMinMaxRadian:: min value radian is larger or equal to max value radian.");
228  throw new ExceptionServoMotor(msg);
229  }
230 
231  try{
232  this->setMinMaxDegree(this->rad2deg(minRadian),this->rad2deg(maxRadian));
233  }catch(IException *e){
234  string msg("setMinMaxRadian:: error while setting max and min values in radian");
235  msg += e->getMsg();
236  throw new ExceptionServoMotor(msg);
237  }catch(...){
238  string msg("setMinMaxRadian:: unknown error while setting max and min values in radian");
239  throw new ExceptionServoMotor(msg);
240  }
241 
242  return;
243 }
244 
245 short ServoMotor::setPositionInDeg(short newPosition){
246  short actPos = newPosition;
247  if((actPos < minDeg_) || (actPos > maxDeg_)){
248  string msg("setPositionInDeg:: degree /radiant value is out of range.");
249  throw new ExceptionServoMotor(msg);
250  }
251 
252  try{
253  pololuCtrl_->setPosition(servoNmb_,this->mapDegValue2PosValue(actPos));
254  }catch(IException *e){
255  string msg("setPositionInDeg:: error while trying to set and move to new position.");
256  msg += e->getMsg();
257  throw new ExceptionServoMotor(msg);
258  }catch(...){
259  string msg("setPositionInDeg:: unknown error while trying to set and move to new position.");
260  throw new ExceptionServoMotor(msg);
261  }
262 
263  return actPos;
264 };
265 
266 float ServoMotor::setPositionInRad(float newPosition){
267  short deg;
268  try{
269  deg = this->setPositionInDeg(this->rad2deg(newPosition));
270  }catch(IException *e){
271  string msg("setPositionInRad:: error while trying to set and move to new position.");
272  msg += e->getMsg();
273  throw new ExceptionServoMotor(msg);
274  }catch(...){
275  string msg("setPositionInRad:: unknown error while trying to set and move to new position.");
276  throw new ExceptionServoMotor(msg);
277  };
278  return (this->deg2rad(deg));
279 };
280 
281 short ServoMotor::getPositionInDeg(){
282  short deg;
283  unsigned short pos;
284  try{
285  pos = this->ServoMotorPololuBase::getPositionInAbs();
286  deg = this->mapPosValue2DegValue(pos);
287  }catch(IException *e){
288  string msg("getPositionInDeg:: error while trying to read servo motor position.");
289  msg += e->getMsg();
290  throw new ExceptionServoMotor(msg);
291  }catch(...){
292  string msg("getPositionInDeg:: unknown error while trying to read servo motor position.");
293  throw new ExceptionServoMotor(msg);
294  }
295 
296  return deg;
297 };
298 
299 float ServoMotor::getPositionInRad(){
300  float rad;
301  short deg;
302  unsigned short pos;
303  try{
304  pos = this->ServoMotorPololuBase::getPositionInAbs();
305  deg = this->mapPosValue2DegValue(pos);
306  rad = this->deg2rad(deg);
307  }catch(IException *e){
308  string msg("getPositionInRad:: error while trying to read servo motor position.");
309  msg += e->getMsg();
310  throw new ExceptionServoMotor(msg);
311  }catch(...){
312  string msg("getPositionInRad:: unknown error while trying to read servo motor position.");
313  throw new ExceptionServoMotor(msg);
314  }
315  return rad;
316 };

318 void ServoMotor::showPololuValues (unsigned short& min, unsigned short& mid, unsigned short& max){
319  mid = neutralPosition_;
320  max = mid + delta_;
321  min = mid - delta_;
322  return;
323 };
324 
325 float ServoMotor::deg2rad(unsigned short x){
326  return (((float)x)*M_PI / 180.0);
327 };
328 
329 short ServoMotor::rad2deg(float x){
330  short d = (short) (((((float)x)*180.0) / M_PI) + 0.5);
331  return d;
332 };
333 
334 unsigned short ServoMotor::mapDegValue2PosValue(short d){
335  float fact, pos;
336  unsigned short servoPos;
337 
338  fact = ((float) this->maxDeg_) - ((float) this->minDeg_);
339  fact = ( 2.0 * ((float) this->delta_) ) / fact;
340 
341  pos = fact * ( ((float) d) - ((float) this->minDeg_) );
342  pos = pos + ((float) (this->neutralPosition_ - this->delta_));
343 
344  servoPos = (unsigned short) pos;
345  return (servoPos);
346 };
347 
348 short ServoMotor::mapPosValue2DegValue(unsigned short p){
349  float fact, pos;
350  short deg;
351 
352  fact = ((float) this->maxDeg_) - ((float) this->minDeg_);
353  fact = fact / (2.0*((float) this->delta_));
354 
355  pos = fact * ( ((float) p) - ((float) (neutralPosition_ - delta_)) );
356  pos = pos + ((float) minDeg_);
357 
358  deg = (short) pos;
359  return (deg);
360 };
